MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G71 postcode area of Uddingston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.15pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Jacks Road substation are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.09pm on Tuesday 12th January 2021
